name: Pact with a witch
detailed_description:
-It´s an Interactive Visual Novel that offers a large number of decisions
that will allow you to reach satisfactory endings unless you have chosen wrongly.-

WARNINGS:
- ADULT CONTENT.
- WORK IN PROGRESS: 70% FINISHED(from day 5, most of the content is in color sketches).

GENRE:
- Date-Sim - Interactive Visual Novel

TAGS:
- Gender-Bender
- Male protagonist
- Small tits
- Big tits
- Sex
- Blowjob
- Romance
- Mystery
- Hardcore

PLOT:
Your roommate and best friend tries to rape Neus, the most introverted of the whole design school, who bites him just after you save her.
You discover that bite was not only for self-defense, it also contains a bewitching that turns your roomate step by step into a girl.
Who everyday that pases, she seem forgeting more his past and becoming more attracted to you.
To save your friend, you make a pact wit Neus to have 3 dates, and the last night she promises to return his original male form to your buddy.
Although it seems that she keeps her word, there are sinister things she had not told you yet.

short_description: -EARLY ACCES - GAME NOT FINISHED YET-Hoping to save your childhood friend from a lifetime transformed into a woman, you have agreed to have 3 dates with the witch who punished him for trying to rape her.She seems honest and open, but you sense something sinister about her..

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4 or newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
